data.question: What is the pore size of SIFSIX-14-Cu-i?
What is the adsorption capacity of SIFSIX-14-Cu-i for acetylene under 0.01 bar and 298 K?

Does SIFSIX-14-Cu-i exhibit higher selectivity for C2H2/C2H4 separation compared to other materials?
Can SIFSIX-14-Cu-i completely block ethylene molecules?
Is the adsorption capacity of SIFSIX-14-Cu-i for acetylene at low pressure higher than SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
What is the kinetic diameter of an ethylene molecule?
What method was used for detailed modeling studies of UTSA-200a?
data.answer: First-principles dispersion-corrected density functional theory (DFT-D) method

data.question: What is the effect of CO2, H2O, and O2 on the separation capacity of UTSA-200a?
Can UTSA-200a be recycled for C2H2/C2H4 separation without losing performance?
What is the recovery percentage of C2H2 after desorption from UTSA-200a?
Does the presence of moisture affect the separation performance of UTSA-200a?
What is the purity of C2H2 recovered from UTSA-200a?
Is the framework of UTSA-200a stable after multiple adsorption and breakthrough experiments?
What is the IAST selectivity of UTSA-200a for binary C2H2/C2H4 mixtures at 1 bar and 298 K?
What is the C2H2 uptake capacity of UTSA-200a from a 1/99 C2H2/C2H4 mixture?
Does UTSA-200a exhibit the highest C2H2 uptake capacity among the materials evaluated?
What is the role of the SiF6 2− anions in UTSA-200a?
data.answer: They are functional binding sites that interact with adsorbed C2D2 molecules through cooperative CD⋅⋅⋅F H-bonding.

data.question: What is the effect of reducing the aperture size to 3.4 Å in UTSA-200a compared to SIFSIX-2-Cu-i?
data.answer: It enables sieving of C2H2 from C2H4 by blocking C2H4 molecules while allowing C2H2 molecules to enter the pore cavities.

data.question: Is the adsorption-induced lattice distortion in UTSA-200a a permanent effect?
